item0.jcr:title: We.Retail all JPEG Images under Apparel
item0.value: SELECT s.* FROM [dam:Asset] AS s where ISDESCENDANTNODE(s, "/content/dam/we-retail/en/products/apparel") AND s.[jcr:content/metadata/dc:format] = "image/jpeg" ORDER BY s.[jcr:content/cq:name] ASC

item1.jcr:title: We.Retail All Activities
item1.value: SELECT * from [dam:Asset] AS a WHERE isdescendantnode(a, '/content/dam/we-retail/en/activities') AND [/jcr:content/metadata/dc:title] IS NOT NULL AND [/jcr:content/metadata/dc:description] IS NOT NULL AND [/jcr:content/metadata/xmp:CreatorTool] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY NAME(a) ASC

item2.jcr:title: We.Retail Hiking Camping
item2.value: SELECT * from [dam:Asset] AS a WHERE isdescendantnode(a, '/content/dam/we-retail/en/activities/hiking-camping')
